article_title: Play of the Day: Ben Carson's Stabbing History
article_text:
Climate scientists this week released a study suggesting climate change could cause warm weather, leading to diminished “coital frequency." Late Show's Stephen Colbert joked about the study and tied it to Barack Obama's rejecting of the Keystone XL project.

Republican Ben Carson is under more scrutiny after CNN is questioning a story Carson has told about his violent past. Saturday Night Live joked about it, with Weekend Update anchor Michael Che saying commenting on the racial aspect of it. The Tonight Show's Jimmy Fallon showed video of Carson being confronted on the issue and compared the candidate to Robert Durst.

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Ross Gianfortune
article_metadata.description: The neurosurgeon-turned-candidate\'s backstory is being questioned again.

Climate scientists this week released a study suggesting climate change could cause warm weather, leading to diminished “coital frequency."
Republican Ben Carson is under more scrutiny after CNN is questioning a story Carson has told about his violent past.
Late Show's Stephen Colbert joked about the study and tied it to Barack Obama's rejecting of the Keystone XL project.
The Tonight Show's Jimmy Fallon showed video of Carson being confronted on the issue and compared the candidate to Robert Durst.
Saturday Night Live joked about it, with Weekend Update anchor Michael Che saying commenting on the racial aspect of it.
